Text: Thank you very much. I'm really looking forward to seeing this!
Thanks, lovely little film but spoiled by the wording 'FOR SCREENING PURPOSES ONLY' at the bottom of the screen throughout the film

Don't care about the 'FOR SCREENING PURPOSES ONLY' bit, just care about getting a chance to see this film of which I have heard such good things! Thank you very much CPtScene, for posting this here for all to appreciate and share.
